name: network-edge-devtools
description: Use the Microsoft Edge (Chromium) Network tool from within Visual Studio Code to see your site's network requests

scripts.build: npm run build-wp && npm run build-post
scripts.build-and-lint: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wp && ts-node postBuildStep.ts debug
scripts.build-watch: npm run build && npm run watch
